jcr:content.jcr:description: Altra signature FootShape™ comfort gives your feet more space to sit naturally. Choose from three unique FootShape™ Fits and give yourself a better run.
jcr:content.jcr:title: Altra's Signature FootShape™

overlayImage.altText: Split screen of a man's and woman's foot with the Footshape design around it.

text.text:
GIVE YOURSELF A BETTER RUN


A RANGE OF FOOTSHAPE™ FITS FOR A RANGE OF FEET

Our signature FootShape™ comfort gives your feet more space to sit naturally and addresses biological differences in men's and women's feet.

image.alt: Chart of the three FootShape™ fits in comparison to a standard shoe

text_1742469609.text: Designed to address a range of unique fits, differing in width from heel to toe box, FootShape™ gives your feet more space to sit naturally for a more comfortable run.

text.text: FOOTSHAPE™ FITS

text_1371721706.text: The FootShape™ Fit that started it all, Original is the roomiest of our three options.

text.text:
FIND IT IN:

Road shoes and classic trail models.

image.alt: Two women running in the woods

text_1371721706.text: Our most common Footshape™ Fit, right in the middle of Original and Slim.

text.text:
FIND IT IN:

A range of shoes including road and trail.

text_1371721706.text: Our slimmest-fitting option still allows room for your toes to spread out naturally.

text.text:
FIND IT IN:

The Altra Rivera.
NOW AVAILABLE IN WIDE SIZES

text_581417797.text: Our Wide versions of the Lone Peak 8, Torin 7, Paradigm 7, Lone Peak 7 and Torin 5 Leather are wider in the midfoot, heel, and forefoot than our standard Lone Peak, Torin, Paradigm and Torin Leather models.
